desc.en: Changsha Metro is an urban rail transit serving Changsha City, Hunan Province, China, including subway systems and maglev systems. Its first line was opened on April 29, 2014, and its Maglev Express is the first medium and low-speed maglev line with completely independent intellectual property rights in China.

updateHistory.reason: The issue of changing the color scheme of Changsha Metro Line 1 to Shanghai Metro Line 1.
